attributes.action: Hold a referendum regarding the future funding of the BBC
attributes.additional_details: We believe the BBC has become a biased, partisan media organisation which no longer fairly and truly represents the British populace and we should have a choice whether to subscribe to it or not.
attributes.background: We wish the government to hold a public referendum regarding whether the television licence fee should continue.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
